attributes.action: Raise the Age of Smoking to 18 years old
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe the age of 16 years old is too low to alow people to buy cigarettes and should be raised to 18 years old to make it harder for childeren to start

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
